abstract: A music item that represents a song.

# Song

**Structure**

A music item that represents a song.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Song
```

## Instance Properties

- **albumTitle**: The title of the album the song appears on.
- **albums**: The song’s associated albums.
- **artistName**: The artist’s name.
- **artistURL**: The artist’s URL.
- **artists**: The song’s associated artists.
- **artwork**: The artwork for the song.
- **attribution**: For classical music only, the name of the artist or composer to attribute to the song.
- **audioVariants**: The variants that indicate the quality of audio available for the song.
- **composerName**: The name of the song’s composer.
- **composers**: The song’s composers.
- **contentRating**: The rating of the content.
- **discNumber**: The number of the disc the song appears on.
- **duration**: The duration of the song.
- **editorialNotes**: The editorial notes for the song.
- **genreNames**: The names of the song’s associated genres.
- **genres**: The song’s associated genres.
- **hasLyrics**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the song has lyrics available in the catalog. If true, the song has lyrics available; otherwise, it doesn’t.
- **id**: The unique identifier for the song.
- **isAppleDigitalMaster**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the song is an Apple Digital Master.
- **isrc**: The International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) for the song.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the song on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the song to the library.
- **movementCount**: For classical music only, the movement count of this song.
- **movementName**: For classical music only, the movement name of this song.
- **movementNumber**: For classical music only, the movement number of this song.
- **musicVideos**: The song’s associated music videos.
- **playCount**: The number of times the user played the song.
- **playParameters**: The parameters to use to play the song.
- **previewAssets**: The preview assets for the song.
- **releaseDate**: The release date (or expected prerelease date) for the song.
- **station**: The song’s associated station.
- **title**: The title of the song.
- **trackNumber**: The song’s number in the album’s track list.
- **url**: The URL for the song.
- **workName**: For classical music only, the name of the associated work.

## Default Implementations

- **FilterableMusicItem Implementations**
- **MusicLibraryRequestable Implementations**

## Music Items

- **Album**: A music item that represents an album.
- **Artist**: A music item that represents an artist.
- **Curator**: A music item that represents a curator.
- **Genre**: A music item that represents a genre.
- **MusicVideo**: A music item that represents a music video.
- **Playlist**: A music item that represents a playlist.
- **RadioShow**: A music item that represents a radio show.
- **RecordLabel**: A music item that represents a record label.
- **Station**: A music item that represents a station.
- **Track**: A music item that represents a track.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- FilterableMusicItem
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicCatalogChartRequestable
- MusicCatalogSearchable
- MusicItem
- MusicLibraryAddable
- MusicLibraryRequestable
- MusicLibrarySearchable
- MusicPlaylistAddable
- MusicPropertyContainer
- MusicRecentlyPlayedRequestable
- PlayableMusicItem
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
